about_the_game:
Legend of a Soul Hunter is an action adventure game with RPG elements. The game focuses on the free exploration of the sea and the secrets of their islands. The resurrection of the Soul Guard destroyed the peace of the world. Ryan, the protagonist, became a soul hunter after the resurrection with the task of saving the world from its demise. His unique abilities and the many different items you get during the game will hopefully help him restore peace.


  • Unique items for puzzles, combat and magic including various upgrades
  • 10 individual dungeons with unique boss and mechanics
  • > 20 islands to explore
  • > 10 different types of enemies
  • > 50 quests with own stories
  • > 30 hidden treasures
  • Various mini-games
  • 3D with stylized graphics


Explore the sea and different areas with the ship. The areas are all different. Some are barren and very hot, others lie in the eternal ice or in dense forests, each island has its own secret. Come by at different times and discover hidden puzzles.


Explore the 10 individual dungeons, each with a unique boss. Each dungeon has a special mechanic that can be mastered by the respective items. Legend of a Soul Hunter has a mine dungeon, a heaven dungeon, a leviathan dungeon and many more.


Fight monsters and bosses, use any items you have received and be creative. Note that some monsters can be fought very individually.


In addition to the main story, there is much more to discover in the game. Complete various side quests, find hidden treasures, become stronger and upgrade your equipment to become the ultimate soul hunter!
